segment.source: Packages Node
segment.target: Packages Node

segment.source: Packages Node
segment.target: Packages Node

segment.source: Packages Node
segment.target: Packages Node

segment.source: The Packages node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: The Packages node is one level below the Application Virtualization System node in the Scope pane of the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of packages.
segment.target: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of packages.

segment.source: Right-click the Packages node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click the Packages node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Package
segment.target: New Package

segment.source: Displays the New Package Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Package Wizard.

segment.source: This wizard consists of the following three pages:
segment.target: This wizard consists of the following three pages:

segment.source: Enter the package name and path to the corresponding package file (SFT).
segment.target: Enter the package name and path to the corresponding package file (SFT).

segment.source: Enter the relative path to the SFT file.
segment.target: Enter the relative path to the SFT file.

segment.source: This path must be relative to the Server Content root.
segment.target: This path must be relative to the Server Content root.

segment.source: View the summary screen, and click Finish to add the new package.
segment.target: View the summary screen, and click Finish to add the new package.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the view of the server.
segment.target: Refreshes the view of the server.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: If you right-click any package that appears under the Packages node in the Scope pane, the following elements are available.
segment.target: If you right-click any package that appears under the Packages node in the Scope pane, the following elements are available.

segment.source: Add Version
segment.target: Add Version

segment.source: Displays the Add Package Version Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the Add Package Version Wizard.

segment.source: Use this wizard to enter the full path to a new SFT file, or browse to the location of a new SFT file.
segment.target: Use this wizard to enter the full path to a new SFT file, or browse to the location of a new SFT file.

segment.source: This wizard also has a summary screen.
segment.target: This wizard also has a summary screen.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes a package from the Results pane.
segment.target: Deletes a package from the Results pane.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Changes the name of a package in the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the name of a package in the Results pane.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the view of the server.
segment.target: Refreshes the view of the server.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected package.
segment.target: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected package.

segment.source: The Properties dialog box displays the GUID information, the package name, and a list of applications (including version number and enabled status) associated with the package.
segment.target: The Properties dialog box displays the GUID information, the package name, and a list of applications (including version number and enabled status) associated with the package.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.target: About Application Virtualization Packages
